feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.4.20
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Revert "Improve types around nodemailer" by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15637

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.4.19...3.4.20

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.4.21
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix MSSQL tests. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15639
  • Improve typing around plugins. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15619
  • Skip ancestors validation on plugins components by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15641
  • Improve types around nodemailer (take 2) by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15638

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.4.20...3.4.21

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.4.22
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Group UI improvements by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15634
  • Handle spaces on hbs binding validations by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15642

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.4.21...3.4.22

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.4.23
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Remove types by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15653
  • Typescript conversion for some BBUI components by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15623
  • Type sidepanel by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15590
  • Fix app deletion issue in development by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15657
  • Move snippets to sidepanel by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15595
  • Rewrite relationship field by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15629
  • Remove mocks from public variant of users.spec.ts by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15643
  • De-mock the environment variable tests. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15651
  • De-mock AI column search tests. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15661
  • Cleanup after automation tests. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15662
  • Disabling ArangoDB by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15663
  • Delete airtable.spec.ts. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15656
  • Remove redis mock from application.spec.ts. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15660
  • Fix test flake. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15654
  • Type BBUI multiselect by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15666
  • Typing field by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15667
  • Fixing BBReference field by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15673

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.4.22...3.4.23

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.4.24
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix automation test output when loop max iterations or failure condition hit by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15675
  • Budi 9011 - DecodeId helper by @mikesealey in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15549
  • Disable Posthog session recording by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15677
  • Fixing wrongly display bindings on JS by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15678

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.4.23...3.4.24
